nodes.text: Taloos group was a group of Xizor Transport Systems Container Transports that hauled supplies.

Following the Battle of Hoth, the two container transports were inspected by personnel stationed at Outpost D-34, namely Maarek Stele, and found to be carrying machinery. Their inspection coincided with a Rebel attack on the platform, but due to their peaceful nature, the craft were left to continue on their intended course.
